about_the_game:
Don't roll up! Come and cultivate immortality! Starting from scratch, cultivate the magnificent scenery of Xianmen! "The Strongest Ancestor" is a joyful simulation mobile game of fishing and cultivating immortals. The game contains a large number of cultivation memes and simulation management gameplay. As the founder of the immortal sect, you will provide immortal training for mortal disciples, recruit various "talents" and "crouching dragon and phoenix chicks", and provide them with various job opportunities, such as immortal fields, alchemy, refining tools, mining and other production positions. Hand in hand, you will teach immortal methods and contract the disciple's journey to cross the tribulation and ascend to the next level.
"Disciples randomly generated, with thousands of people and faces, belong to your exclusive card drawing disciples"
We randomly assigned the attributes generated by the disciples in the game, and each disciple's appearance, destiny, attributes, strengths, and even lifespan were all random, making it a "thousand people and a thousand faces". Disciple levels are divided into five levels: red, orange, purple, blue, and green, with decreasing qualities.
"Free construction, clever integration of simulation management and cultivation gameplay"
Immortals farming, how can they learn it themselves? The game cleverly integrates simulation management gameplay with cultivation of immortals, allowing players to adopt a new perspective of sect operators, with the goal of "establishing sects and cultivating disciples", thus providing players with a completely new "cultivation" gaming experience.
"Experience combat techniques, cross tribulations and soar, immersive cultivation of immortals"
The game is based on "simulated farming and management" as the bottom layer, providing disciples with various "natural materials and treasures" for cultivation resources. At the same time, it also achieves a series of immersive novel experiences such as pill refining, forging magic treasures, experiencing combat skills, and crossing tribulations and soaring. There are also fun gameplay such as college classes, law school discipline, talisman drawing, martial arts rubbings, and the forbidden area behind the mountain to create a more realistic cultivation world.
"Ink wash style+meticulous painting art style, full of ancient charm and immortal style"
Ink wash style+meticulous painting art style, ranging from mountains and seas exotic beasts to stones and trees, full of ancient charm and immortal style, allowing you to have a fantasy of immortal fate like a cultivation novel!
The most joyful world of cultivation is all in "The Strongest Patriarch"!

name: 最强祖师

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64位
  • Processor: Core M3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Grahics Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

publishers: 青岛霆行网络科技有限公司
